title: Spider Wall Lamp 7 Arms Black
body: Minimalist yet brimming with creativity, the Spider Wall Lamp 7 Arms, by Mobelaris, is a shining example of the sophisticated, thoughtful light fixtures of the 20th century. A high-end style that expresses the originality and elegance of the original design, our version is made with Lacquered tapered iron and hand-polished in a black finish and brass details.
